front.title: IETF Network Slice Topology YANG Data Model

abstract.t: An IETF network slice may use a customized topology to describe intended resource reservation for connectivities between slice endpoints. Customized topologies enable customers to request shared resources among connections activated on demand and to customize the service paths in a network slice with an extensive level of control. This document describes a YANG data model for managing and controlling customized topologies for IETF network slices defined in RFC YYYY. [RFC EDITOR NOTE: Please replace RFC YYYY with the RFC number of draft-ietf-teas-ietf-network-slices once it has been published.
